CRM Integration

connecting-britain API integration platform providing database driven screen pops.  The connecting-britain CRM connector app integrates with back-office applications using APIs (Salesforce.com, Zendesk, etc.)  By leveraging APIs, the connecting-britain extension will search any internal database a present the findings in a new window. The app also recognizes any phone number presented in Google Chrome and transforms it into a clickable link for seamless click to dial.
